name: Burning Blood
description: At the end of the combat, heal 6 HP.
fun_fact: Your body's own blood burns with undying rage.

name: Ring of the Snake
description: At the start of each combat, draw 2 additional cards.
fun_fact: Made from a fossilized snake. Represents great skill as a huntress.

name: Cracked Core
description: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Lightning orb.
fun_fact: The mysterious life force which powers the Automatons within the Spire. It appears to be cracked.

name: Pure Water
description: At the start of each combat, add 1 Miracle card into your hand.
fun_fact: Filtered through fine sand and free of impurities.

name: Akabeko
description: Your first Attack each combat deals 8 additional damage.
fun_fact: Muuu~

name: Anchor
description: Start each combat with 10 Block.
fun_fact: Holding this miniature trinket, you feel heavier and more stable.

name: Ancient Tea Set
description: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, start the next combat with 2 extra Energy.
fun_fact: The key to a refreshing night's rest.

name: Art of War
description: If you do not play any Attacks during your turn, gain an extra Energy next turn.
fun_fact: This ancient manuscript contains wisdom from a past age.

name: Bag of Marbles
description: At the start of each combat, apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
fun_fact: A once popular toy in the City. Useful for throwing enemies off balance.

name: Bag of Preparation
description: At the start of each combat, draw 2 additional cards.
fun_fact: Oversized adventurer's pack. Has many pockets and straps.

name: Blood Vial
description: At the start of each combat, heal 2 HP.
fun_fact: A vial containing the blood of a pure and elder vampire.

name: Bronze Scales
description: Whenever you take damage, deal 3 damage back.
fun_fact: The sharp scales of the Guardian. Rearanges itself to protect its user.

name: Centennial Puzzle
description: The first time you lose HP each combat, draw 3 cards.
fun_fact: Upon solving the puzzle you feel a powerful warmth in your chest.

name: Ceramic Fish
description: Whenever you add a card to your deck, gain 9 gold.
fun_fact: Meticulously painted, these fish were revered to bring great fortune.

name: Dream Catcher
description: Whenever you rest, you may add a card to your deck.
fun_fact: The northern tribes would often use dream catchers at night, believing they led to self improvement.

name: Happy Flower
description: Every 3 turns, gain 1 Energy.
fun_fact: This unceasingly joyous plant is a popular novelty item among nobles.

name: Juzu Bracelet
description: Regular enemy combats are no longer encountered in ? rooms.
fun_fact: A ward against the unknown.

name: Lantern
description: Gain 1 Energy on the first turn of each combat.
fun_fact: An eerie lantern which illuminates only for the wielder.

name: Maw Bank
description: Whenever you climb a floor, gain 12 Gold. No longer works when you spend any Gold at the shop.
fun_fact: Surprisingly popular, despite maw attacks being a regular occurrence.

name: Meal Ticket
description: Whenever you enter a shop, heal 15 HP.
fun_fact: Complimentary meatballs with every visit!

name: Nunchaku
description: Every time you play 10 Attacks, gain 1 Energy.
fun_fact: A good training tool. Improves the posture and agility of the wielder.

name: Oddly Smooth Stone
description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Dexterity.
fun_fact: You have never seen something so smooth and pristine. This must be the work of the Ancients.

name: Omamori
description: Negate the next 2 Curses you obtain.
fun_fact: A common charm for staving off vile spirits. This one seems to possess a spark of divine energy.

name: Orichalcum
description: If you end your turn without Block, gain 6 Block.
fun_fact: A green tinted metal of an unknown origin. Seemingly indestructible.

name: Pen Nib
description: Every 10th Attack you play deals double damage.
fun_fact: Holding the nib, you can see everyone ever slain by a previous owner of the pen. A violent history.

name: Potion Belt
description: Upon pickup, gain 2 Potion slots.
fun_fact: I can gold more Potions using this belt!

name: Preserved Insect
description: Enemies in Elite rooms have 25% less HP.
fun_fact: The insect seems to create a shrinking aura that targets particularly large enemies.

name: Regal Pillow
description: Heal an additional 15 HP when you Rest.
fun_fact: Now you can get a proper night's rest.

name: Smiling Mask
description: The merchant's card removal service now always costs 50 Gold.
fun_fact: Mask worn by the merchant. He must have spares...

name: Strawberry
description: Raise your Max HP by 7
fun_fact: Delicious! Haven't seen any of these since the blight.

name: The Boot
description: Whenever you would deal 4 or less unblocked Attack damage, increase it to 5.
fun_fact: When wound up, the boot grows larger in size.

name: Tiny Chest
description: Every 4th ? room is a Tresure room.
fun_fact: "A fine prototype." - The Architect

name: Toy Ornithopter
description: Whenever you use a potion, heal 5 HP.
fun_fact: This little toy is the perfect companion for the lone adventurer.

name: Vajra
description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Strength.
fun_fact: An ornamental relic given to warriors displaying glory in battle.

name: War paint
description: Upon pick up, Upgrade 2 random Skills.
fun_fact: In the past, Ironclads would create wards using enchanted war paint before charging into battle.

name: Whetstone
description: Upon pick up, Upgrade 2 random Attacks.
fun_fact: "Flesh never beats steel" - Kublai the Great

name: Red Skull
description: While your HP is at or below 50%, you have 3 additional Strength.
fun_fact: A small skull covered in ornamental paint.

name: Snecko Skull
description: Whenever you apply Poison, apply an additional 1 Poison
fun_fact: A snecko skull in pristine condition. Mysteriously clean and smooth, dirt and grime fall off inexplicably.

name: Data Disk
description: Start each combat with 1 Focus
fun_fact: This disk contains precious data on birds and snakes.

name: Damaru
description: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Mantra.
fun_fact: The sound of the small drum keeps your mind awake, revealing a path forward.
